Reviews.Title: Great phone for Euro travel
Reviews.Author: Jeff Kline "j"
Reviews.Content: Recently I went to Holland, Belgium and France, getting a sim chip for each country.  The phone worked flawlessly.  I used it as a MP3 player.  A camera.  A gps.  Loved it.  As for the GPS, I was surprised that it could locate me without using a data network.The phone is on the smallish side, but when traveling I don't need a full-sized phone.  That did have an advantage as it was one less bulky thing to deal with.What sucks is that I come back to the US, where you just can't buy a simm someplace and just use it.  You have to join a f'n network.

Reviews.Title: Very small, even for petite fingers, otherwise good phone.
Reviews.Author: MagnoliaSouth "As soon go kindle fire with sn...
Reviews.Content: Before I get to it I'm not going to discuss the features here because they are all listed in the product information above.That said, we bought three of these phones because we are both upgrading to data plans/smart phones and we're planning a trip, later this year, to the UK. We didn't want to have to buy a smart phone now and an International one later, so this seemed like the logical solution. We use T-Mobile in the US.I was a little disappointed when I read the reviews. Much of what I wanted to know didn't exist, and so I thought I'd share them so you'll know.The first thing to know is that the phone is designed for Australia, but it does work in the US. There are a number of Australian apps that come preloaded on it.One thing that seemed relatively essential is what comes in the box. For whatever reason, it is not mentioned here, so here is what comes with it.*  Phone (obviously) that has about a 75% charge.*  Navigon maps of Australia and New Zealand are pre-loaded (or the leaflet in the box says it is, I've not yet figured out where they are, not that I need them).*  A charger cord that is native to Australia, but it also comes with a US adapter that works fine.*  A 2GB micro SD card.*  A micro SD card adapter.*  A quick start guide (there is NO full manual, but you can download the UK pdf; see the link in the comments of this review).*  White ear plugs.*  An Australian recycle-your-old-phone bag (totally useless here in the US).I don't much care for the way the contact list works (you have to type the entire name, which is an ancient technology), but maybe that's an Android issue. In any case, there are plenty of free Contact apps that you can use to replace it.Its worst problem is its size. I thought it sounded big enough, by the specs listed, but it isn't. I have relatively small fingers and even for me trying to type on it is a neat trick, at best. I highly recommend getting an inexpensive stylus, if you insist on buying it.If I could afford it, I would return these due their small size and typing issues, but because of the current administration of this country, I do not have that luxury. We will simply have to grin and bear it.Its good points are that it is fast, so long as you have an appropriately sized micro SD card and it's easy to use. It doesn't take long to figure out how to use it at all. Again, this was my first foray into the smart phone technology so for a newb it was easy. That says a lot.All in all it is a decent phone, except for its size.

Reviews.Title: excellent
Reviews.Author: Randoll
Reviews.Content: excellent cellphone, very fast and cheaps, for the price is very good for my wife, it's small and ligth, with a good procesor

Reviews.Title: my wife loved it
Reviews.Author: J. R. Alvarado
Reviews.Content: it has all the most popular features other high end phones have (GPS, camera, touchscreen, voice recognition, etc...) at a very affordable price. 6 months of constant use so far and zero problems

Reviews.Title: Smasung GT-S5360L Galaxy Y Unlocked Phone
Reviews.Author: Clifton
Reviews.Content: Good affordable phone with great battery life.  I bought this phone for my son and he loves it. This is not an expensive phone but for daily use it is a good reliable phone.

Reviews.Title: Samsung GT-S5360
Reviews.Author: Natalia
Reviews.Content: Purchased this phone as a gift and my friend loves the phone. It works great for her in Mexico. I recommend it highly.

Reviews.Title: Very good
Reviews.Author: Kell
Reviews.Content: As a person living outside the USA, this phone works very well. I have definitely no issues with it.  Its an unlocked phone and I would definitely recommend it to anyone who needs an unlocked phone

Reviews.Title: My considerations
Reviews.Author: Alberto S Moraes
Reviews.Content: The device per se is wonderful and worths de price. However, despite it came unblocked, it came with a Telstra (Australia) software that I cannot wipe out. There are no root firmwares avaiable for the Australian device, so I cannot upgrade the firmware and restart the device for Samsung factory settings.

Reviews.Title: Great little phone
Reviews.Author: B. Jones
Reviews.Content: ProSmallConvenientWorks well in JamaicaConSmall screen hard to type with big fingers, but still usableHard to find cases locally

Reviews.Title: What a great phone!!!
Reviews.Author: franny
Reviews.Content: My husband loved his new phone I bought for him.  It has everything he wanted in a phone (Music, Wi-fi, the works).

Reviews.Title: Samsung GT-S5360
Reviews.Author: bjornpdx
Reviews.Content: I'm taking a trip to Scotland this summer and I wanted a compatible cell phone for UK.  Based on the reviews here I bought this Samsung model. I was a little concerned about the size of the phone since several reviewers complained that it was too small. It is small but I kind of like it that way. On screen typing isn't too bad, but I do hit the wrong key more frequently than on larger phones. I'll be using the phone mostly to make phone calls anyway.The default language was Spanish when I first booted up the phone, but that was easily changed. It connected with my home wi-fi with no problems. It also has blue tooth and GPS. It's running Android 2.3.6 with a bunch of built in apps. The processor is noticeably slower than my regular cell phone, but no surprise there. It's fast enough for my needs.I went to an AT&T; store and bought a $10 SIM card just to make sure the phone will actually work as a phone. No problem there either.I'll post an update when I get back from Scotland.

Reviews.Title: Phone not what was advertised.
Reviews.Author: D. G. Kennedy
Reviews.Content: The first phone I received was faulty and would not read a SIM card. While I was trying to troubleshoot the problem, I discovered the phone was marketed in Australia, and therefore all the software and applications were for the Australian cell phone/communications market. The phone was replaced with one that works but I will have to try to remove not applicable software apps and attempt to load the ones I need.

Reviews.Title: OK Phone for SMALL fingers......Long nails won't help.....
Reviews.Author: Hugh F.
Reviews.Content: OK Phone for SMALL fingers......Long nails won't help.......Very difficult to remove back to change out SIM cards for foreign travelwhich is the reason one buys an unlocked, quad band cell phone....Reasonable price....

Reviews.Title: YOU CAN'T GO WRONG WITH SAMSUNG
Reviews.Author: HMH "hmichael0330"
Reviews.Content: I've tried just about every brand name under the sun, but let me tell you, Samsung is gradually winning me over one gadget at a time.  This little phone is exactly what I was looking for.  I wanted something small enough to put in my shirt pocket, or slide inside a PC bag and that Samsung GT- S5360L did the trick. The phone came in a brand new and sealed box. Not a refurbished or pre-owned unit. Thank God.  Besides the size, this inexpensive cellphone is packed with just about all the features one will find on a more expensive unit minus the balk. I just placed my TMobile SIM card in the slot and started calling right away. NO CONTRACT. COMPLETELY UNLOCKED. Buy as you go.  It was so easy for me to connect the WiFi to my network at home, boom, boom, boom I was already online, just about everything from my google account to my Skype seem to Sync automatically and effortlessly with just a few key strokes.  I would recommend this phone to anyone who is looking for a nice phone with Android platform. Oh, one more thing, there's loads of Apps out there that you can download FREE of charge to enhance the experience.  Would I recommend this phone to a friend?  YES, YES, YES.

Reviews.Title: Good Product
Reviews.Author: Zee "MZIA"
Reviews.Content: As usual it's a great product from Samsung.Easy to navigate + GSM Unlock ( Able to use different Carriers) + all Smart phone features.

Reviews.Title: I returned never got my money back
Reviews.Author: alex jaramillo
Reviews.Content: If I could i would give it a ZERO rate. I returned this item because it comes with so much pre installed software that spends your data without even doing anything.  I got this phone for android development, but the pre installed software generates so many errors that is very difficult to debug my own apps, the effect for a normal user would be a fast battery depletion, data usage, and  continuously running processes  DON'T buy it

Reviews.Title: good phone
Reviews.Author: ABCIS
Reviews.Content: Samsung GT-S5360L Galaxy Y Unlocked Quad-Band 3G GSM Phone with Android OS, 3-Inch Touchscreen, 2MP Camera, Wi-Fi and GPS - International Version - No Warranty - Metallic Grayi like it all my friends want it because the design is perfect very good phone for the price i recommand for everybody who like small phone

Reviews.Title: This is NOT an unlocked phone
Reviews.Author: Wayne D.
Reviews.Content: I purchased this phone based on description that it was an unlocked phone.  I even wrote a good review when it arrived on time to my address.  Then I took it to London and it did not work.  IT IS LOCKED.  I bought the SIM only to learn it would not work.I tried to return it when I came back from my trip and was informed that the return period was over.  I'm stuck with nonfunctional phone.  I am NOT HAPPY.

Reviews.Title: Phone does not work
Reviews.Author: nand
Reviews.Content: Calls are almost never completed; when the battery gets low the phone freezes and won't recharge.  It is a nightmare.

Reviews.Title: Poor
Reviews.Author: Felix Fandoh
Reviews.Content: The charger to the phone is not functioning. It doesn't even fit into the electric socket. The wifi never connects.

Reviews.Title: Good phone, Good for travel
Reviews.Author: David K Wright
Reviews.Content: I bought this to have a cellphone while traveling in Europe.  For that purpose, it's perfect because the phone is smaller and lighter than newer phones.  The camera is decent, good for snapshots.

Reviews.Title: good for the price
Reviews.Author: sudharshan
Reviews.Content: good value for money , its mainly for youths and youngsters  which is the highlight and its an android phone

Reviews.Title: Too hard to type, a bit slow running and it crashes continuously due to a conflict with contacts
Reviews.Author: MIGUEL HERNANDEZ
Reviews.Content: The screen is too small for me to type, so I am making mistakes all the time, which can be quite annoying. I also get an error message due to a conflict with the contacts I have in my SIM Card, somehow I cannot find my contacts through the search function and the phone does not allow me to save or edit existing contacts without crashing. Other than that, the phone is a good choice for someone looking for the cheapest smart android available. I would always recommend a larger screen if you can afford it.

Reviews.Title: basic n tolerable
Reviews.Author: Yaniq Brn
Reviews.Content: prefer the s galaxy will use until i get 1. but a tolerable phone to use for the moment, basic users will like, andriod apps work gr8

Reviews.Title: Got this phone for my teenage son
Reviews.Author: MARIA BRISSETT
Reviews.Content: My son is so excited about this phone, only because it has wi-fi and apps on it... I know he cant wait for it to arrive to him

Reviews.Title: good
Reviews.Author: herve pugin
Reviews.Content: very good product, come in time at a good price. works good, I'm to buy this product. I will recommend it

Reviews.Title: Excelente!!!
Reviews.Author: Maria Colmenarez
Reviews.Content: Exactamente lo que ofrece es lo que da! Satisfecha!! Buena compra en relación precio calidad. Tiene todo lo que buscas en un android, se puede navegar tranquilamente, puedes bajar tus aplicaciones sin problema. Lo recomiendo si lo que busca es economia y a la vez calidad!

Reviews.Title: Horrible
Reviews.Author: Alricka Bailey
Reviews.Content: When the memory card is in the phone it wipe everything off the card as far as picture , music etc . The phone is terrible.

Reviews.Title: Terrible phone
Reviews.Author: A. Emata "dancer geek"
Reviews.Content: This phone is terrible and I would not reccomend it. I just sent mine back because it would not recieve calls properly. The phone feels incredibly cheap and is not worth the asking price. Not all of the apps I like were supported on this device.

Reviews.Title: bueno
Reviews.Author: kimberley Castañeda
Reviews.Content: excelente producto, llego en perfecto estado..verdaderamente me encanta,me atrevo a recomendarlo plenamente, cumplió con mis expectativas, es cómodo y practico

Reviews.Title: smaller than I thought
Reviews.Author: Donald McDowell
Reviews.Content: I ordered this phone thinking it was full size, but it turned out it's much smaller than my other cell phones.  Maybe this phone is intended for use by children or people with small hands/ fingers. Maybe the Galaxy "Y" means youth?  I never bothered to turn it on but I am sure like other Samsung phones it would be great.  Just the small size which made me return it.  Received the order very quickly which was great and refund was prompt as well.
